sqlMap.select:
select T.*, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename, (select P.typeno from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as typeno, (select P.color from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as color, (select P.packaging from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as packaging, (select P.unit from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as unit, (select P.item10 from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as item01, (select P.item11 from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as item11, (select C.suppliername from etb_purchase C where C.purchaseno = T.purchaseno) as suppliername, (select C.purchasedate from etb_purchase C where C.purchaseno = T.purchaseno) as purchasedate, (select S.res01 from etb_purchase S where S.purchaseno = T.purchaseno) as baozhuang, (select S.theme2 from etb_purchase S where S.purchaseno = T.purchaseno) as bookno from etb_purchaseitem T where 1 = 1
T.productid = #productid#
T.supplierid = #supplierid#
order by T.updatedate,T.id desc LIMIT #start#, #end#

select * from ( select T.*, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename, (select P.typeno from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as typeno, (select P.color from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as color, (select P.packaging from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as packaging, (select P.unit from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as unit, (select P.item10 from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as item01, (select P.item11 from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as item11, (select C.suppliername from etb_purchase C where C.purchaseno = T.purchaseno) as suppliername, (select C.purchasedate from etb_purchase C where C.purchaseno = T.purchaseno) as purchasedate, (select S.res01 from etb_purchase S where S.purchaseno = T.purchaseno) as baozhuang, (select S.theme2 from etb_purchase S where S.purchaseno = T.purchaseno) as bookno, (select S.status from etb_purchase S where S.purchaseno = T.purchaseno) as status1 from etb_purchaseitem T where 1 = 1
T.productid = #productid#
T.supplierid = #supplierid#
) A where 1 = 1 and A.status1 != 20 order by A.updatedate,A.id desc

select count(*) from ( select T.*, (select S.suppliername from etb_supplier S where S.id = T.supplierid) as suppliername, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename, (select P.typeno from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as typeno, (select P.color from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as color, (select P.packaging from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as packaging, (select P.unit from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as unit, (select P.makearea from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as makearea, (select P.item10 from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as item01, (select P.item11 from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as item11, (select "") as purchasedate from etb_purchaseitem T where 1 = 1 and T.status != 20 and T.remainquantity > 0 ) A where 1 = 1
A.suppliername like '%$suppliername$%'

select * from ( select T.*, (select S.suppliername from etb_supplier S where S.id = T.supplierid) as suppliername, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename, (select P.typeno from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as typeno, (select P.color from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as color, (select P.packaging from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as packaging, (select P.unit from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as unit, (select P.makearea from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as makearea, (select P.item10 from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as item01, (select P.item11 from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as item11, (select "") as purchasedate from etb_purchaseitem T where 1 = 1 and T.status != 20 and T.remainquantity > 0 ) A where 1 = 1
A.suppliername like '%$suppliername$%'
order by A.suppliername asc, A.theme2 asc, A.productid asc LIMIT #start#, #end#

select T.*, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename, (select P.typeno from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as typeno, (select P.color from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as color, (select P.packaging from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as packaging, (select P.unit from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as unit, (select P.makearea from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as makearea, (select P.item10 from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as item01, (select P.item11 from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as item11, (select "") as suppliername, (select "") as purchasedate from etb_purchaseitem T where 1 = 1 and T.status = 1
T.purchaseno = #purchaseno#
order by T.id asc
sqlMap.delete: update etb_purchaseitem set status = 0, updateuid = #updateuid#, updatedate = NOW() where purchaseno = #purchaseno#
DELETE FROM etb_purchaseitem WHERE purchaseno = #purchaseno# AND status = 0
sqlMap.update: update etb_purchaseitem set quantity = #quantity#, beforequantity = #beforequantity#, inquantity = #inquantity#, remainquantity = #remainquantity#, unitprice = #unitprice#, taxunitprice = #taxunitprice#, amount = #amount#, taxamount = #taxamount#, plandate = #plandate#, approverid = #approverid#, note = #note#, rank = #rank#, status = #status#, res01 = #res01#, res02 = #res02#, res03 = #res03#, res04 = #res04#, res05 = #res05#, res06 = #res06#, res07 = #res07#, res08 = #res08#, res09 = #res09#, res10 = #res10#, updateuid = #updateuid#, updatedate = NOW() where id = #id#
